Description: Fragment of neck and strap handle, with gradual curve, of a Knidian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine red-brown. Diamond stamp with sceptre symbol.
Type series: KT 971 (Virginia Grace's unpublished K(nidian) T(ype) series)
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (291)
